product_name: Aquaglide Chelan HB 2 Inflatable Tandem Kayak
long_description: Designed for all-around use, this inflatable tandem kayak has a long waterline, flat rocker, and fine, piercing bow for great performance, outstanding tracking and effortless glide through the water.
short_description: Designed for all-around use, this inflatable tandem kayak has a long waterline, flat rocker, and fine, piercing bow for great performance, outstanding tracking and effortless glide through the water.
